Sentencas: Utilization of carbon dioxide from industrial waste streams offers significant reductions in global carbon dioxide emissions.
Titulo: Enhanced carbon dioxide electrolysis at redox manipulated interfaces

Sentencas: Solid oxide electrolysis is a highly efficient, high temperature approach that reduces polarization losses and best utilizes process heat; however, the technology is relatively unrefined for currently carbon dioxide electrolysis.
Titulo: Enhanced carbon dioxide electrolysis at redox manipulated interfaces

Sentencas: In most electrochemical systems, the interface between active components are usually of great importance in determining the performance and lifetime of any energy materials application.
Titulo: Enhanced carbon dioxide electrolysis at redox manipulated interfaces

Sentencas: Here we report a generic approach of interface engineering to achieve active interfaces at nanoscale by a synergistic control of materials functions and interface architectures.
Titulo: Enhanced carbon dioxide electrolysis at redox manipulated interfaces

Sentencas: We show that the redox-manipulated interfaces facilitate the atomic oxygen transfer from adsorbed carbon dioxide molecules to the cathode lattice that determines carbon dioxide electrolysis at elevated temperatures.
Titulo: Enhanced carbon dioxide electrolysis at redox manipulated interfaces

Sentencas: The composite cathodes with in situ grown interfaces demonstrate significantly enhanced carbon dioxide electrolysis and improved durability.
Titulo: Enhanced carbon dioxide electrolysis at redox manipulated interfaces
